data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Palmeiras with the kick-off.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Palmeiras at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Throw-in Internacional.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
In the minute 3, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Free kick Internacional.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional.
In the minute 6, Attention is being given to Palmeiras’s Gabriel Menino and play has been suspended briefly.
Gabriel Menino is back on his feet again.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 8, Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
Caio Vidal is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 11, Goal! Internacional have got their heads in front thanks to a Edenilson strike.
Internacional’s Caio Vidal is on his feet again at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Gustavo Scarpa for Palmeiras gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 12, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Internacional a goal kick.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Caio Vidal (Internacional) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Palmeiras defenders.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Internacional.
Palmeiras have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 18, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras just outside Internacional's area.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 20, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Internacional throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Thiago Galhardo (Internacional) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Palmeiras at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Caio Vidal (Internacional) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 25, In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Willian (Palmeiras) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Gabriel Menino is booked for the away team.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 29, Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Internacional.
Throw-in Palmeiras.
In the minute 31, Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Internacional have a goal kick.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
In the minute 33, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
In the minute 36, Palmeiras are whistled for offside.
Savio Pereira Sampaio waits before resuming play because Praxedes for Internacional is still down.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Internacional's half.
In the minute 39, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Palmeiras, close to Internacional's area.
Praxedes returns to the field for Internacional after picking up a slight injury.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Palmeiras.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
In the minute 43, Free kick Internacional.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 45, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Can Internacional capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Palmeiras's half?
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Internacional kick-off.
Palmeiras push forward at Estadio Beira-Rio and Gabriel Menino gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Internacional defence.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Abel Braga (Internacional) is making a first substitution, with Yuri Alberto replacing Praxedes.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Raphael Veiga with Breno Lopes. This is the first substitution made today by Abel Ferreira.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Thiago Galhardo is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Thiago Galhardo has recovered and rejoins the match in Porto Alegre.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Throw-in high up the field for Palmeiras in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Internacional.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Internacional.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Internacional drive forward but Thiago Galhardo is judged offside.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Internacional's half.
Internacional have a goal kick.
In the minute 57, In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Palmeiras's Matias Vina gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
In the minute 59, The away team replace Marcos Rocha with Mayke.
Abel Ferreira is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Beira-Rio with Ze Rafael replacing Danilo.
Gabriel Veron is replacing Matias Vina for Palmeiras at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
Throw-in Internacional.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
In the minute 62, Edenilson (Internacional) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Porto Alegre, Thiago Galhardo of Internacional is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 63, Internacional are pushing forward but Caio Vidal's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Patrick (Internacional) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 64, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In Porto Alegre, Rodrigo Dourado (Internacional) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 66, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ze Rafael for Palmeiras who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 67, Palmeiras's Ze Rafael looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Free kick Palmeiras.
In the minute 69, In Porto Alegre Palmeiras attack through Willian. The finish is off target, however.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Internacional a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Rodrigo Lindoso is replacing Thiago Galhardo for the home team.
In the minute 71, Marcos Guilherme is on a sub for Caio Vidal for Internacional.
At Estadio Beira-Rio, Thiago Galhardo has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 72, Palmeiras drive upfield and Gustavo Scarpa gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Internacional defender.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Gustavo Gomez (Palmeiras) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 72, Internacional have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
Ze Rafael of Palmeiras gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Palmeiras's Lucas Lima misses with an attempt on goal.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Internacional a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Gabriel Silva is replacing Lucas Lima for Palmeiras at Estadio Beira-Rio.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Internacional in the half of Palmeiras.
Rodrigo Moledo is back on the pitch.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Porto Alegre to check on Rodrigo Moledo, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 82, Patrick (Internacional) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Rodrigo Moledo for Internacional has been booked by Savio Pereira Sampaio and receives a first yellow card.
Great finish from Yuri Alberto to give Internacional a 2-0 lead.
Edenilson with an assist there.
In the minute 85, Internacional to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Internacional throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Internacional needs to be cautious. Palmeiras have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Palmeiras's Gabriel Silva breaks free at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 87, Internacional make their fourth substitution with Andres D'Alessandro replacing Patrick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Abel Braga is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio Beira-Rio with Lucas Ribeiro replacing Rodrigo Dourado.
In the minute 89, Palmeiras are coming forward and Willian gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Internacional have a goal kick.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Internacional.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Porto Alegre.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Palmeiras's Breno Lopes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Gustavo Scarpa (Palmeiras) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
